column1: #Text=Main Bolin Korra Lin Beifong Opal Beifong Toph Beifong Suyin Beifong Zhu Li Antagonists Baatar Jr. .
#Text=Kuvira Military of the Earth Empire says : " Minor Asami Sato Baatar Dragon eel spirit Huan Juicy Mako Raiko Tenzin Varrick Wei Wing Wu " Shiro Shinobi says : " The Avatar has gone missing .
#Text=" Shaman says : " A dark energy has infected her .
#Text=We must purge it before it destroys her Avatar Spirit .
#Text=Let the waters cleanse the darkness that plagues your spirit .
